page.title: 12Industry in Corby
page.content: Celebration Arts is a subsidiary of the international firm Greetings Cards of America based in Ohio.They produce over 8 million Christmas cards per year plus Greetings cards. The unit on Corby's Industrial estate prints and packs the cards and houses a large distribution warehouse.They employ about 500 workers 250 at the unit and 250 in sales posts in shops etc.During the Christmas rush June to October they employ over 200 temporary staff and outworkers.Much of their revenue comes from licensing the famous characters ie Holly Hobby,Care Bears,The Get Along Gang and Strawberry Shortcake to other firms producing spin off products like shoes(Dunlop),soft toys(Mettoy),soft furnishings etc. Most of the characters and cards are created in Ohio but the Corby factory has a small graphic art unit.They also make cards for companies like Smiths & Boots
